action.primary: Kills parasites, dispels Dampness and stops itching

indications: All types of itching (scabies, tinea, eczema)

contraindications: Contraindicated for internal use. It should be used externally only.

useCases: Topically, as a tincture for itching
Itching due to Wind and Damp-Heat
As a steam or sitz-bath for itchy anus
As a steam or sitz-bath for itchy anus with a tendency toward Blood Deficiency
As a steam or sitz-bath for itchy anus with toxicity from Wind-Damp-Heat

notes: This herb can be used alone as a tincture, or as a plaster combined with vinegar.
It treats scabies, lichen complex and eczema.
